gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
gospel.text:
[[Lc 11,42]]The Lord said: "Woe to you Pharisees! You pay tithes of mint and of rue and of every garden herb, but you pay no attention to judgment and to love for God. These you should have done, without overlooking the others.
[[Lc 11,43]]Woe to you Pharisees! You love the seat of honor in synagogues and greetings in marketplaces.
[[Lc 11,44]]Woe to you! You are like unseen graves over which people unknowingly walk."
[[Lc 11,45]]Then one of the scholars of the law said to him in reply, "Teacher, by saying this you are insulting us too."
[[Lc 11,46]]And he said, "Woe also to you scholars of the law! You impose on people burdens hard to carry, but you yourselves do not lift one finger to touch them."

psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 1,1]]Blessed the man who follows not 
the counsel of the wicked 
Nor walks in the way of sinners, 
nor sits in the company of the insolent,
[[Ps 1,2]]But delights in the law of the LORD 
and meditates on his law day and night.

[[Ps 1,3]]He is like a tree 
planted near running water, 
that yields its fruit in due season, 
and whose leaves never fade. 
Whatever he does, prospers.

[[Ps 1,4]]Not so, the wicked, not so; 
they are like chaff which the wind drives away.
[[Ps 1,6]]For the LORD watches over the way of the just,
but the way of the wicked vanishes.

first_reading.title: Letter to the Galatians
first_reading.text:
[[Ga 5,18]]Brothers and sisters: If you are guided by the Spirit, you are not under the law.
[[Ga 5,19]]Now the works of the flesh are obvious: immorality, impurity, licentiousness,
[[Ga 5,20]]idolatry, sorcery, hatreds, rivalry, jealousy, outbursts of fury, acts of selfishness, dissensions, factions,
[[Ga 5,21]]occasions of envy, drinking bouts, orgies, and the like. I warn you, as I warned you before, that those who do such things will not inherit the kingdom of God.
[[Ga 5,22]]In contrast, the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, generosity, faithfulness,
[[Ga 5,23]]gentleness, self-control. Against such there is no law.
[[Ga 5,24]]Now those who belong to Christ (Jesus) have crucified their flesh with its passions and desires.
[[Ga 5,25]]If we live in the Spirit, let us also follow the Spirit.
